Greetings everyone, Damion here with a little challenge for the whole community. We are currently at around 27,000 members on these forums, which means that KSP has become bigger then my home community. Well, here\'s what I want to see...

Tweet about KSP

Facebook about KSP

Put up videos!

Put up screenshots!

Blog!

You name it, let\'s set our first goal at reaching 30,000 members on the forums by the end of the month! Time to start pushing KSP to the masses, let\'s make it go viral!

-DR
Roll up roll up ksp for the masses
We can possibly have a one-week sale for 5.00? That could in a way really help out.

We can possibly have a one-week sale for 5.00? That could in a way really help out.

That is not my call, Nor would I agree with it to be honest,

I\'ve been spreading \'the news\' about KSP for a while now. I think I started in September last year with posting frequently on facebook and twitter.

Spread the word!

Hey guys, long time KSP lurker here... I saw this thread and felt the need to get involved.

KSP is one of those little gems you find while trawling thru the general mess of the internet, and when i came across it about a month and a half ago i haven\'t put it down since.

sorry i trailed off on a random point then, what im trying to say is what your forum needs is a section for user created videos or pictures, a section where people like me can post our KSP lets plays and live streams so the community can find and enjoy them with relative ease.

there are ALOT of good LP\'ers out there (myself not included lmao) who have an audience of 1000\'s, and for the KSP community to have a place where we can support them and help bring KSP into the world a bit more widespread, is just what we need.

with all that said i wanna wish you guys the best of luck with the 0.16 patch. this is gonna be one of those games that every pc gamer will have heard of, and im ready to do my part to help it get there.

peace KSP community, catch you on the interwebs

We can possibly have a one-week sale for 5.00? That could in a way really help out.

I wouldn\'t - you might end up with hold-outs waiting for a sale \'next time\'. The game is well worth $15 - it\'s the main reason I haven\'t forked out Â£45 for Diablo III. High praise indeed!

I have a Kerbal Space Program photo album on Facebook, which is popular - everyone I know likely to play it is now hopelessly hooked. The Kevin Bacon effect has no doubt already kicked in.

There is also a way the team can help, they can make official G+ and FB pages. They can also make a twitter if they wanted. I\'m going to start spreading the word on Twitter... As soon as I get an account(I just view tweets, I\'m getting a twitter later today.)
The official Facebook page is here: Official KSP Facebook Page. If you haven\'t liked it then please do so, that should help spread the word.
The official Twitter page is here: Twitter Kerbal Space Program.

> > > > > > > > > > > > > > >

Why no Google+ KSP????? I just G+\'d KSP. The message will reach over 1500 people .

BTW, a cool feature is that when you insert the link in the message (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/) Google automatically ads a picture with a short text about the site .

Perhaps I\'ll talk with the community manager and work on getting all the KSP LP\'ers together to help push this further.

-DR
You can count on me. Lets push it to the max!
You also forgot another important thing: Forums. Topics about KSP on (game)forums.
Is there any risk of the resultant rapid influx of new participants in the KSP community causing problems therein? Just playing devil\'s advocate as regards the push.
Onward and Outward, my fellows! For Squad and Kerbal!
I got the Simtropolis (SC4) Forum into it!

How many people have actually bought KSP so far? I\'m thinking of making a video about it too. Though I only have 10 or soo views a day

http://www.youtube.com/user/NannerAirCraft?feature=mhee

I idea: put a link to KSP in your signature on other forums (if it\'s not against their rules of course).

I\'m going to put it on the LeagueReplays Forum.

Got 4K posts, so a high chance that at least some people will see and click on it... I hope.

What other places/methods could we use?

Is there a KSP wallpaper or something? I might have access to a A3 printer so I could spam some public area\'s with it.

How many people have actually bought KSP so far?

Squad has not released any information of this nature. Most of what is known has been done through inference which has a high degree of error.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Sorry guys, no can do. :\'( Everyone I meet is already sick of hearing about KSP from me. It\'s all I\'ve talked about for the past few months.

That is not my call, Nor would I agree with it to be honest,

Right. There\'s already a free version to serve as a demo, and the price is good.
Maybe I could bring in a couple people by making a compilation of everything I have ever made.
Allow spambots. 3k new users in up to no time ;P

I\'ve made a thread in my old forums and multiple people have posted 'Wow I bought this game it\'s that fun' kind of replies. Always great to show off fun games like that.

SQUAD should seriously consider contacting NASA, they would love the fact that there is a game that encourages rocket science, engineering, and problem solving like KSP. If NASA posts an Angry Birds Space game, I\'m sure they\'d promote a game like kSP lol.
